name: Power UnLicheted
description:
You are a powerful lich, able to defeat any army that comes for you - but you also need souls to sustain yourself. Defeat the humans too much, and they will succumb to despair and stop giving you new souls - but feign too much weakness, and they will gain the courage to stand up to you.

It's a delicate balance - how long will your reign last?

(In other words, to fit the game jam's theme: you have the unfair advantage, but you shouldn't overuse that advantage.)

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Left click (can hold): Attack
  • QE: Cycle available spells

Credits

  • Made with Bevy Engine for Bevy Jam #1
  • Font used: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
  • Player and Enemy Sprites: 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72

The game's source code can be viewed on Github.
